version_description:
1、Add new feature of Daily Card
2、Add new feature of recommand to friend
3、Bug fix: News detail
4、Bug fix: Voiceover feature

1. Optimized some experience issues
2. Add novel TAB

1、Add new feature of 【BookList】,Personalize your books
2、Bug fix

1、Click the word to pronounce, long press the word to unlock Pro editing function.
2、Support word underlined、partial translation, and bold display of word bank.
3、Add new feature of notation, come to share your thoughts.

大事件发生！第93届奥斯卡“神预言·瓜分10000元”上线！快来更新app参与活动吧，错过的话，就大无语哦！

往期功能：
1、单击单词即发音，长按单词解锁Pro编辑功能。
Click the word to pronounce, long press the word to unlock Pro editing function.
2、支持划词翻译，划线标注，生词本内单词加粗展示。
Support word underlined、partial translation, and bold display of word bank.
3、新增批注功能，快来留下你的想法。
Add new feature of notation, come to share your thoughts.
